articles.title: Record numbers: 73 companies announce bonus issues so far - Economic Times
articles.description: Bonus shares are additional shares a company gives free to its existing shareholders based on the number of shares they hold. For instance, a company could give one bonus share for one share held or two bonus shares for every share owned by the investor.
